department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Proposal to purchase, delivery and installation office  Seating
description: Purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to the National Capital Region by October 2024.
full_summary:
**Office Seating Request for Proposal (RFP)**
==============================================


**Reference Number**: WS4607901021-Doc4621158224
**Solicitation Number**: WS4607901021
**Publication Date**: June 5th, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: June 20th, 2024, 2:00 pm EDT

### Background
Public Works Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Real Property Branch has a requirement for the provision of office seating to the Canada Revenue Agency in the National Capital Region by October 2024.

### Request for Proposal (RFP)
A competitive and open bidding process is being undertaken for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating. Bidders are required to submit their proposals and necessary supporting documentation by June 20th, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT. Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

### Procurement Information

*   Contract Type: Goods (Seating)
*   UNSPSC Classification: 56112100
*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services
*   Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Important Notes

*   The full RFP and attachments can be accessed and downloaded from the SAP Ariba platform.
*   Please disregard the CanadaBuys response deadline closing time.

### Contact Information
For more information on this RFP, please contact:

Michelle Wong
SPAC/PSPC
[ Michele.Wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ](mailto:Michele.Wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
    Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

### Legal Disclaimer
Information and RFP documents are subject to change. It is the bidder's responsibility to verify the information and documents before submitting their proposal.

### Tender Description Summary

The bidder is required to provide high-quality office seating to the Canada Revenue Agency in the National Capital Region by October 2024. The selected bidder will be responsible for the purchase, delivery, and installation of the office seating. The bidder is required to submit their proposal and necessary supporting documentation in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP. Please refer to the RFP for a detailed description of the requirements.  Thank you!  Your skills will be quite useful to this government organization!
